author: kfogel
msg: Replace SVN_DAV_FULLTEXT_MD5_HEADER with these two, though we'll
probably only use the latter initially.

author: kfogel
msg: For issue #689: Standardize on hex representation for checksums, with
compatibility code for the old base64 checksums.
(svn_wc_process_committed): Record text base checksum in hex.
(svn_wc_install_file): Record text base checksum in hex.
(apply_textdelta): Compare both hex and base64 against entry checksum.
(svn_wc_transmit_text_deltas): Compare both hex and base64 against

author: gstein
msg: Get the commit author into the parameters for later usage.
(main): pass the repository to the Config constructor so that it can
get data from there (e.g. author or further config info). stop
calling .prep_groups() as the Config will get itself set up.
(generate_content): use the new repos.author property rather than
fetching it from the repos manually.
(Config.__init__): take a repository object, set up a set of global
(Config._prep_groups): renamed from .prep_groups. set up the param

author: rassilon
msg: 4369 that slipped into the propset commit and link to shfolder.lib
